prompt_base: cinematic portrait of an elegant man, pale light-blue skin tone, short silver hair, wearing realistic Galactic Patrol armor, serene expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, subtle sheen on blue skin, realistic metallic texture on armor, sharp focus on silver hair
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, human skin color, flat lighting, low quality
